effects.description: Determines if the particle and other visual effects of the bonemeal-ing action should appear.
effects.markdownDescription: Determines if the particle and other visual effects of the bonemeal-ing action should appear.

type.description:
[Block Action Type](../block_action_types.md)

Applies bone meal to the target block as if a dispenser or a player used a Bone Meal item to it.

Type ID: `origins:bonemeal`
